snippet: Many Congolese fear that President Joseph Kabila is trying to wiggle out of term limits and hold onto power indefinitely....
abstract: Political protests become deadly in Kinshasa, capital of Democratic Republic of Congo, killing at least six people and injuring others as Pres Joseph Kabila does nothing to prepare country for presidential election for his replacement as his term comes to end; many fear Kabila's lack of action means he will attempt to ignore term limits and remain in power.
lead_paragraph: Many Congolese fear that President Joseph Kabila is trying to wiggle out of term limits and hold onto power indefinitely.

headline.main: Kinshasa, Congo, Is Locked Down as Protests Erupt Against Joseph Kabila
headline.print_headline: Congo’s Capital Smolders as Deadly Protests Erupt
